data.system_settings: Latest Discord android alpha, Android Lollipop, Samsung Galaxy S6
data.actual_result: You can type in the unauthorised to send messages box
data.expected_result: You can't type in the unauthorised to send messages box
data.short_description: Ability to type in unauthorised to send messages text box
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone type a invite link such as "discord.gg/discord-testers"- Click on the invite so the invite modal pops up- Click "Join Discord Testers" so it puts you in the default channel that's locked (#rules in this case)- Type in the message bar
